mapper.select: SELECT YRYC_EMP_ID, YRYC_USE_CO, YRYC_NOW_CO FROM YRYC WHERE YRYC_EMP_ID = #{emplId}

SELECT Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_RM, Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND, Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE, Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS Y, EMPL E WHERE Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = #{emplId} AND Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID ORDER BY YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO YRYC_USE_DTLS( YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN , YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE , YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE , YRYC_USE_DTLS_RM , COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND , COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE , YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID , COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE) VALUES (YRYC_USE_DTLS_SEQ.nextval, #{yrycUseDtlsBeginDate}, #{yrycUseDtlsEndDate}, #{yrycUseDtlsRm}, #{commonCodeYrycUseKind}, #{commonCodeYrycUseSe}, #{yrycUseDtlsEmplId}, 'N')
SELECT YRYC_USE_DTLS_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_RM, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN = #{yrycUseDtlsSn}

SELECT #{formatSanctnKnd} || '-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-' || LPAD( (SELECT TO_NUMBER(COUNT(*)) + 1 FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE SUBSTR(YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, 1, INSTR(YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, '-') - 1) = #{formatSanctnKnd}), 4, '0' ) AS elctrnSanctnEtprCode FROM DUAL

SELECT Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE, Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS Y, EMPL E WHERE Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = #{emplId} AND Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE = 'YRYC032' ORDER BY YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE DESC

SELECT Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE, Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND, E.EMPL_NM AS YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_NM, UF.UPLOAD_FILE_STRE_NM AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS Y JOIN EMPL E ON Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UF ON E.PROFL_ETPR_CODE = UF.UPLOAD_FILE_ETPR_CODE WHERE E.COMMON_CODE_DEPT = (SELECT E1.COMMON_CODE_DEPT FROM EMPL E1 WHERE E1.EMPL_ID = #{emplId}) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE AND Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE AND Y.COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE = 'YRYC032' AND Y.YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID != #{emplId} ORDER BY YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE DESC

SELECT YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN, YRYC_USE_DTLS_BEGIN_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_END_DATE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_RM, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE, YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID, COMMON_CODE_YRYC_STATE FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN = #{yrycUseDtlsSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE YRYC SET YRYC_USE_CO = YRYC_USE_CO + (SELECT CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND = 'YRYC010' and COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC022' THEN 1 WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND = 'YRYC010' and COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE IN ('YRYC020', 'YRYC021') THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = #{yrycUseDtlsEmplId} AND COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE IN ('YRYC020', 'YRYC021', 'YRYC022') AND YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN = #{yrycUseDtlsSn}), YRYC_NOW_CO = YRYC_NOW_CO - (SELECT CASE WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND = 'YRYC010' and COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE = 'YRYC022' THEN 1 WHEN COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_KIND = 'YRYC010' and COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE IN ('YRYC020', 'YRYC021') THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END FROM YRYC_USE_DTLS WHERE YRYC_USE_DTLS_EMPL_ID = #{yrycUseDtlsEmplId} AND COMMON_CODE_YRYC_USE_SE IN ('YRYC020', 'YRYC021', 'YRYC022') AND YRYC_USE_DTLS_SN = #{yrycUseDtlsSn}) WHERE YRYC_EMP_ID = #{yrycUseDtlsEmplId}
